attributes.action: ensure that providers of GAS to UK residents use simple methods to calculate the cost; of either gas used or for selecting future tariff's.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GAS providers have introduced many new tariff's including fixed price tariff's such as 1 or two year options. GAS suppliers do not provide UK consumers with a simple method of calculating "The cost of gas used". This also has an adverse effect on the consumer when attempting to make an informed choice about the tarriff they would like take up for future gas use
